entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
